content:
IWithHostname<ParentT>.ForHostname Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.HostNameSslBinding.Definition
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.dll

In this Article

Specifies the hostname to bind SSL certificate to.

public Microsoft.Azure.Management.AppService.Fluent.HostNameSslBinding.Definition.IWithCertificate<ParentT> ForHostname (string hostname);
Parameters
hostname
String

The naked hostname, excluding "www". But use . prefix for wild card typed certificate order.

Returns
IWithCertificate<ParentT>

To be added.
